column2: BRIEF-Carriage Services Announces Pricing Of Senior Notes Offering May 23 (Reuters) - Carriage Services Inc: * CARRIAGE SERVICES ANNOUNCES PRICING OF SENIOR NOTES OFFERING * CARRIAGE SERVICES INC - PRICED ITS PRIVATE OFFERING OF $325 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 6.625% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 * CARRIAGE SERVICES - INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING TO REPAY ITS EXISTING INDEBTEDNESS UNDER ITS EXISTING SECURED CREDIT FACILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Carriage Services Announces Offering Of Senior Notes May 15 (Reuters) - Carriage Services Inc: * CARRIAGE SERVICES INC - INTENDS TO OFFER $325 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 * CARRIAGE SERVICES INC - INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS OF PROPOSED OFFERING TO REPAY ITS EXISTING INDEBTEDNESS UNDER ITS EXISTING SECURED CREDIT FACILITY * CARRIAGE SERVICES - IN CONNECTION WITH OFFERING, CO EXPECTS TO ENTER INTO A NEW $150 MILLION SENIOR SECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Carriage Services Announces Agreements To Exchange About $115 Mln Of Its 2.75% Convertible Subordinated Notes Due 2021 For Common Stock And Cash May 3 (Reuters) - Carriage Services Inc: * CARRIAGE SERVICES ANNOUNCES AGREEMENTS TO EXCHANGE APPROXIMATELY $115 MILLION OF ITS 2.75% CONVERTIBLE SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE 2021 FOR COMMON STOCK AND CASH * CARRIAGE SERVICES INC - ANTICIPATES THAT EXCHANGES WILL SETTLE ON OR ABOUT MAY 7, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Carriage Services Enters Eighth Amendment,Commitment Increase To Credit Agreement April 27 (Reuters) - Carriage Services Inc: * ON APRIL 25, ENTERED EIGHTH AMENDMENT,COMMITMENT INCREASE TO CREDIT AGREEMENT TO INCREASE REVOLVING CREDIT COMMITMENT TO $200 MILLION * AMENDMENT TO PERMIT COMPANY TO USE PROCEEDS OF REVOLVING LOANS Source text for Eikon: (bit.ly/2Kh8a3g) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Carriage Services Reports Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share Of $0.52 April 24 (Reuters) - Carriage Services Inc: * CARRIAGE SERVICES ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RECORD RESULTS AND LOWERS ROLLING FOUR QUARTER OUTLOOK * SEES ROLLING FOUR QUARTER REVENUES $274 MILLION - $277 MILLION * SEES ROLLING Q4 ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.80 - $1.85 * LOWERING MIDPOINT OF ROLLING FOUR QUARTER OUTLOOK RANGES ON REVENUE BY 2.5% & ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS BY 9.9% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
